info.name: TucanBIT GrooveTech API Collection
info.description: Complete API collection for TucanBIT Casino platform with GrooveTech integration - User Registration, OTP Verification, Authentication, Forgot Password Flow (OTP-based password reset with email delivery, JWT token generation, and secure password validation), Game Launch, Account Management, Balance Operations, Transaction Processing (Wager, Result, Wager&Result, Rollback, Jackpot, Rollback On Result, Rollback On Rollback), Signature Validation, Cashback System (User Levels, Tier Management, Balance Synchronization, House Edge Configuration), Admin Dashboard, User Management (Admin Operations, Account Blocking, Password Reset, Player Registration), Configuration Management (Risk Settings, Spinning Wheel Config, Level Management, Loot Box Configuration), Game Management APIs (Complete CRUD operations for games including create, read, update, delete, and bulk operations), House Edge Management APIs (Complete CRUD operations for house edge configurations with game type filtering and statistics), Analytics APIs (Real-time Stats, User Analytics, Transaction History, Daily Reports, Top Games, Top Players), and Edge Cases

variable.description: GrooveTech security key for HMAC-SHA256 signature generation
Enable/disable signature validation for GrooveTech endpoints
Game session ID from game launch
Win transaction ID for rollback on result
JWT access token for analytics API authentication
OTP code for password reset verification
OTP ID for password reset verification
Test user email for forgot password flow
User ID for Falcon Liquidity API testing

request.description: Register a new user account. Returns OTP ID for email verification.

response.name: Successful Registration
response.body:
{
  "message": "Please check your email to verify your account and complete registration",
  "user_id": "f678dde6-9990-498a-9d68-609ac4fa1188",
  "email": "testuser@example.com",
  "otp_id": "0bcaccf5-32cc-481c-85b9-90227d707542",
  "expires_at": "2025-09-13T21:08:59Z",
  "resend_after": "2025-09-13T21:00:59Z"
}

request.description: Retrieve OTP code from Redis for verification. Run this command in terminal to get the OTP code.
Complete user registration by verifying OTP code. Returns final user ID and access token.

response.name: Registration Completed
response.body:

request.description: Login user and get JWT access token for GrooveTech operations

item.name: Forgot Password Flow
item.description: Complete forgot password functionality with OTP verification and password reset

request.description: Initiates the password reset process by sending an OTP to the user's email. Returns email and OTP ID for frontend localStorage. The OTP is stored in Redis with 10-minute expiry.

response.name: Success Response

item.name: Verify OTP and Get Reset Token

request.description: Verifies the OTP code and returns a JWT token for password reset. The OTP must be valid and not expired (10 minutes).
Updates the user's password using the JWT token from OTP verification. Password must meet strength requirements: minimum 8 characters, uppercase, lowercase, number, and special character.

response.name: Weak Password

request.description: Test login with the new password to verify the password reset was successful.
Launch a GrooveTech game and create a game session. Returns game URL and session ID for subsequent operations.
Validate if a game session is still active and valid

query.description: Game session ID from game launch

request.description: Official GrooveTech Get Account API - Returns account details and user information

query.description: Game session ID from game launch

request.description: Official GrooveTech Get Balance API - Returns current account balance

query.description: Game session ID from game launch
Round ID for the game round

request.description: Official GrooveTech Wager API - Places a bet and deducts funds from player balance. Supports idempotency.

response.name: Insufficient Funds (Code 1006)
response.body:
{
  "code": 1006,
  "status": "Out of money",

  "real_balance": "0",
  "game_mode": 0,
  "order": "",

  "message": "Insufficient funds to place the wager"
}

query.description: Game session ID from game launch

request.description: Official GrooveTech Result API - Processes winnings and credits funds to player balance. Requires gamestatus parameter.

query.description: Game session ID from game launch
Round ID for the game round

request.description: Official GrooveTech Rollback API - Reverses a previous transaction. Requires rollbackamount parameter.

query.description: Game session ID from game launch
Round ID for the game round

request.description: Official GrooveTech Jackpot API - Processes jackpot winnings. Requires gamestatus parameter.
Official GrooveTech Wager and Result API - Combines wager and result operations into a single transaction for instant games. Reduces latency and network traffic.

query.description: Game session ID from start game method
The jackpot win amount to rollback

request.description: Official GrooveTech Rollback On Result API - Reverses a previous result transaction (reversewin). Used when game providers need to rollback result requests, especially in sports games where results can change.

query.description: Game session ID from start game method

request.description: Official GrooveTech Rollback On Rollback API - Reverses a previous rollback transaction (rollbackrollback). Used when game providers need to reverse rollback requests, especially in sports games where results can change after sending a refund request.
Internal GrooveTech account information API
Internal GrooveTech balance API
Check GrooveTech service health status
Get account information with HMAC-SHA256 signature validation. Signature excludes 'request' parameter.

header.description: HMAC-SHA256 signature for wager request validation

request.description: Process wager transaction with HMAC-SHA256 signature validation. Signature includes 'request' parameter.
Helper endpoint to test signature generation. Use this to verify your signature implementation before making actual requests.
Step 1: Register a new user account
Step 2: Get OTP from Redis using the OTP ID from registration
Step 3: Complete registration with OTP verification
Step 4: Login with new user credentials
Step 5: Launch game for new user (creates account and session)
Step 6: Check account balance (should be $0 for new user)
Step 7: Try to place wager with insufficient funds (should return Code 1006)
Step 8: Process result (win) - should work even with $0 balance
Step 9: Verify final balance after win (should be $5)
Step 10: Test combined Wager And Result transaction (bet $2, win $8, net +$6)

item.name: 11. Verify Final Balance After Combined Transaction

request.description: Step 11: Verify final balance after combined transaction (should be $11: $5 + $6 net from combined transaction)
Get all available cashback tiers with their requirements and benefits.

item.name: Game Management APIs
item.description: Complete CRUD operations for game management including create, read, update, delete, and bulk operations

request.description: Create a new game with all necessary details including name, status, photo, price, enabled status, game ID, internal name, integration partner, and provider.

query.description: Sort by field (name, status, created_at, updated_at)

request.description: Retrieve a paginated list of games with optional filtering by status, provider, enabled status, and search functionality.
Retrieve a specific game by its UUID.
Update an existing game's details. All fields are optional for partial updates.
Delete a game by its UUID.
Get comprehensive game statistics including total games, active games, inactive games, maintenance games, enabled games, and disabled games.
Update the status of multiple games at once. Status can be ACTIVE, INACTIVE, or MAINTENANCE.

item.name: House Edge Management APIs
item.description: Complete CRUD operations for house edge management including create, read, update, delete, and bulk operations

request.description: Create a new house edge configuration for a game with game type, variant, house edge percentage, bet limits, and effective dates.

query.description: Sort by field (game_type, game_variant, house_edge, created_at, updated_at)

request.description: Retrieve a paginated list of house edge configurations with optional filtering by game type, variant, and active status.
Retrieve a specific house edge configuration by its UUID.
Update an existing house edge configuration. All fields are optional for partial updates.
Delete a house edge configuration by its UUID.
Get comprehensive house edge statistics including total house edges, active house edges, inactive house edges, unique game types, and unique game variants.

item.name: Get House Edges by Game Type

request.description: Get all house edge configurations for a specific game type (e.g., slot, table, live, etc.).

item.name: Get House Edges by Game Variant

request.description: Get all house edge configurations for a specific game type and variant combination.
Update the active status of multiple house edge configurations at once.

item.name: Falcon Liquidity APIs
item.description: APIs for accessing Falcon Liquidity data without authentication - includes data retrieval, filtering, and summary statistics

query.description: Filter by status (pending, sent, failed, acknowledged)

request.description: Retrieve all Falcon Liquidity messages and data with optional filtering and pagination. No authentication required.

item.name: Get Falcon Liquidity by Transaction ID

request.description: Retrieve Falcon Liquidity messages by specific transaction ID. No authentication required.

item.name: Get Falcon Liquidity by User ID

request.description: Retrieve Falcon Liquidity messages by specific user ID with pagination. No authentication required.

query.description: Filter by status (pending, sent, failed, acknowledged)

request.description: Retrieve summary statistics for Falcon Liquidity data with optional filtering. No authentication required.
